meta.title: Architect to Executor Handoff Package
meta.summary: Assemble finalized task contract and prepare directive handoff payload for executor.

result.summary: Finalized executor handoff package checks by validating handoff metadata integrity, done-status coverage across directive tasks, and directive branch alignment.

task.objective: Finalize executor handoff package metadata by confirming directive handoff payload integrity and completed task-contract coverage for the landing page directive.
constraints: Handoff package must reference existing directive files and current execution branch.
Validation must rely on repository metadata checks and avoid manual-only assertions.
Do not introduce new runtime application changes in this packaging step.

allowed_files.note: Finalize handoff package task contract and results.
Validate completion/status consistency across directive tasks.

steps.instruction: Verify directive handoff payload includes role transfer, session ID, directive branch, required reading, and objective fields.
steps.artifact: Handoff metadata confirms architect->executor transfer package is present and aligned to active branch.

steps.instruction: Verify directive tasks contain completed contract coverage for implementation, audit, blueprint, design contract, and validation.
steps.artifact: All non-handoff tasks are marked done with pass validation evidence.

steps.instruction: Confirm repository branch context remains on the directive branch used by the handoff payload.

expected_output: Handoff payload is present and semantically aligned to the active directive branch and role transition.
All core implementation/design/validation tasks show done status with recorded validation results.
Task finish metadata captures objective evidence for directive-level closeout readiness.
stop_conditions: Stop and ask operator if handoff payload fields are missing, task statuses regress, or branch context diverges from directive metadata.
notes: This task packages and verifies handoff/readiness metadata rather than introducing new feature code.
Final directive closeout can proceed after this task and any operator-requested final checks.
